mapper.sql: id, type_code, type_name, item_code, item_name, remark, create_id, create_time, modify_id, modify_time
mapper.insert: insert into data_dictionary (id, type_code, type_name, item_code, item_name, remark, create_id, create_time, modify_id, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into data_dictionary
id,
type_code,
type_name,
item_code,
item_name,
remark,
create_id,
create_time,
modify_id,
modify_time,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update data_dictionary
type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update data_dictionary set type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT d.id, d.type_code, d.type_name, d.remark, d.create_id, d.create_time, d.modify_id, d.modify_time FROM data_dictionary d
d.type_code like '%${typeCode }%'
d.type_name like '%${typeName }%'
group by d.type_code

SELECT d.id, d.type_code, d.type_name, d.item_code, d.item_name, d.remark, d.create_id, d.create_time, d.modify_id, d.modify_time FROM data_dictionary d
d.type_code = #{typeCode }
